title: Topic 001 Question 026
body: Your company has a Microsoft 365 tenant that uses a domain named contoso.com.
The company uses Microsoft Office 365 Message Encryption (OME) to encrypt email sent to users in fabrikam.com.
A user named User1 erroneously sends an email to user2@fabrikam.com.
You need to prevent user2@fabrikam.com from accessing the email.
options: Instruct User1 to delete the email from her Sent Items folder from Microsoft Outlook.
Instruct User1 to select Remove external access from Microsoft Outlook on the web.
